Niemain was a wizard and a member of the Zhentarim that operated in the Baldurs Gate region of the Sword Coast during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Niemain worked alongside his fellow Zhentarim agent, a necromancer by the name of Xzar.
The Zhentarim mage wore a robe of fire resistance, a useful set of garments as he also carried with him a wand of fire.
For some reason, he also wore a cursed ring of clumsiness, The Jesters Folly.
In the , Niemain and his fellow spellasting associates Oulam, Wheber Ott, and William Garst, on the second story of Sorcerous Sundries in Baldurs Gate.
